## # Xray Policy Resource

Provides an Xray policy resource. This can be used to create and manage Xray v1 policies.

<h4 id="xraypolicyruleactions">Xray<wbr>Policy<wbr>Rule<wbr>Actions</h4>

{{% choosable language csharp %}}

            title="Required">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#xraypolicyruleactionsblockdownload">Xray<wbr>Policy<wbr>Rule<wbr>Actions<wbr>Block<wbr>Download</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}(Optional) Nested block describing artifacts that should be blocked for download if a violation is triggered. Described below.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="customseverity_csharp">
<a href="#customseverity_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Custom<wbr>Severity</a>

## Import


A policy can be imported by using the name, e.g.

```sh
 $ pulumi import artifactory:index/xrayPolicy:XrayPolicy example policy-name
```
